login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Welcome back
login.checkEmailError: Failed to check email. Please try again.

errors.oauth_failed: Google sign in failed. Please try again.
errors.missing_email: Unable to retrieve your email from Google. Please try another login method.
errors.already_on_waitlist: You are already in the waiting list. We will notify you when an invitation is available.
errors.waitlist_failed: Failed to add you to the waiting list. Please try again later.

waitlist.success: We're currently invite-only. You've been added to our waiting list and we'll notify you as soon as we have space!

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join our community
register.name: Name
register.completeForm: Complete the form below to create your account
register.termsPrefix: By creating an account, you agree to our
register.waitlistSuccessToast: Successfully joined the waitlist! Check your email for confirmation.
register.emailChangeDisabledReason: Invited accounts must keep the email that received the invitation. Ask your inviter to send a new link if you need to switch addresses.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a reset link
forgotPassword.success: Password reset link has been sent to your email
forgotPassword.successToast: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
forgotPassword.errorGeneric: Failed to send reset instructions. Please try again.
forgotPassword.tooManyAttempts: Too many password reset attempts. Please try again later.
forgotPassword.checkEmailDescription: We've sent password reset instructions to {{email}}
forgotPassword.noEmailReceived: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.invalidToken: This reset link is invalid or has expired
resetPassword.invalidTokenMessage: Invalid reset link. Email parameter is missing.
resetPassword.validationFailed: Failed to validate reset token. Please try again.
resetPassword.validatingDescription: Please wait while we validate your password reset link.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password.
resetPassword.successAlert: Password reset successfully. Please log in with your new password.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: We've sent a verification link to your email
verifyEmail.maxAttemptsReached: You have reached the maximum number of resend attempts.
verifyEmail.useAnotherEmailDescription: Are you sure you want to use another email address? This will create a new user account and you will need to verify it again.
verifyEmail.cantFindEmail: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder or <1>try resending it</1>
verifyEmail.resendDescription: We'll resend the verification email to <1>{{email}}</1>.
verifyEmail.limitReached: You have reached the resend limit ({{maxAttempts}}).
verifyEmail.successVerifying: Your email has been successfully verified!
verifyEmail.alreadyVerified: Your email address is already verified.
verifyEmail.invalidLink: Your verification link is invalid. You can request a new email below.
verifyEmail.expiredLink: Your verification link has expired. You can request a new email below.
verifyEmail.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.successDescription: Thank you! Your email address has been verified successfully. Redirecting you to the dashboard...
verifyEmail.verificationProblem: There was a problem verifying your email.
verifyEmail.logoutConfirmDescription: You are currently logged in. To verify another email, you must log out first.

logout.title: Logout
logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.successDescription: Your password has been updated successfully. Please log in again.
changePassword.dialogDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers. To confirm, please type your password below.
deleteAccount.successDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted.

setPassword.noEmailError: Unable to determine your email address for this session.
setPassword.genericError: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
setPassword.infoMessage: Your account doesn't have a password set yet. To add one, we'll send a secure link to your email.
setPassword.successMessage: We have sent you an email with password reset instructions
